nodes.bodyText: I know this is something you didn't introduced. But any chance we can change here BUNDLE to something like YAML? I do not think bundle is really clear to what it means. Or is it more complicated then just changing the Enum? (e.g. some pipelines etc.)

nodes.bodyText: @ppatierno I do not think it is a wrong name per se. The problem is that it is ambiguous name. Lot of things are being referred to as bundle ... among others the OLM files are bundles as well. That is why this is so confusing.
